p: Among natural antiviral agents, recent investigations have reconsidered the interest of phyto-polysaccharides, which act as potent inhibitors of different viruses (Martinez et al. 2005). This section will illustrate a variety of antiviral polysaccharides from natural sources since 1990, with the aim of making this matter more accessible to drug development, some typical examples of such medicines and their antiviral activities are shown in Table 3.3.
